Reference

Shapes

These functions return sf objets

esp_get_can_box() esp_get_can_provinces()

Get complementary lines when plotting Canary Islands.

esp_get_munic()

Get municipalities boundaries of Spain

esp_get_prov()

Get Provinces boundaries of Spain

esp_get_ccaa()

Get Autonomous Communities boundaries of Spain

esp_get_nuts()

Get NUTS boundaries of Spain

esp_get_country()

Get boundaries of Spain

esp_get_hex_prov() esp_get_hex_ccaa()

Get an hexbin map with the boundaries of Spain

Tiles

Return static tiles or create a leaflet map

esp_getTiles()

Get Tiles from Public Administations of Spanish.

addProviderEspTiles() providerEspTileOptions()

Leaflet plugin - Spanish providers

Dictionary

Translation across languages and coding systems

esp_dict_region_code() esp_dict_translate()

Convert and translate Subdivision Names

Datasets

These objects are datasets already included in the package.

esp_munic.sf

All Municipalities POLYGON object of Spain

esp_nuts.sf

All NUTS POLYGON object of Spain

esp_codelist

Spanish Code Translation Data Frame

leaflet.providersESP.df

Public WMS and WMTS of Spain

pobmun19

Population by municipality (2019)

About the package

mapSpain-package

mapSpain package
